original_text: The king from the north will decide to march south with all his kingdom's strong army. He will make an agreement with the king of the south. He will give one of his daughters to marry the king of the south. He will try to destroy that kingdom, but his plan will fail. His daughter will not be able to do anything to help him.
korean_text: 그가 결심하고 전국의 힘을 다하여 이르렀다가 그와 화친할 것이요 또 여자의 딸을 그에게 주어 그의 나라를 망하게 하려 할 것이나 이루지 못하리니 그에게 무익하리라

sentences.original_text: The king from the north will decide to march south
sentences.korean_translation: 북쪽의 왕은 남쪽으로 행군하기로 결정할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: with all his kingdom's strong army
sentences.korean_translation: 자신 왕국의 모든 강한 군대와 함께

sentences.original_text: He will make an agreement with the king of the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 남쪽의 왕과 협정을 맺을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will give one of his daughters to marry the king of the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 딸 중 한 명을 남쪽의 왕과 결혼시키기 위해 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will try to destroy that kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 왕국을 파괴하려고 시도할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: His daughter will not be able to do anything to help him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 딸은 그를 도와줄 수 있는 아무것도 할 수 없을 것입니다
